mapper.insert: insert into customer (mid, mpassword, mname, mtel, madress, mdate) values (#{mid}, #{mpassword}, #{mname}, #{mtel}, #{madress}, NOW())
mapper.select: select mid, mpassword, mname, mtel, madress, mdate from customer where mid = #{mid}
select mid, mpassword, mname, mtel, mdate, madress from customer order by mtel desc limit #{startIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}
